DOC.detailed_description: Background : Nursing Home Acquired Pneumonia ( NHAP ) cause excessive morbidity , mortality , hospitalization , loss function . At give time , 1.1-2.5 % veteran reside nursing home care unit ( NHCUs ) State Veterans Homes ( SVHs ) ill pneumonia . Multi-faceted implementation evidence-based guideline show feasible private sector . Retrospective study demonstrate association guideline adherence improve survival . Objectives : Assess feasibility QUERI-like strategy translate guideline practice VA-affiliated nursing home focus group , interview , small intervention trial . Methods : Nursing staff focus group , key informant interview , test academic detail ( educational outreach ) script conduct five facility . Based information gather , QUERI-like intervention modify tested Florence , Colorado SVH one influenza season compare intervention nearby SVH . Forty random SVH nursing staff take anonymous telephone survey knowledge attitude NHAP twice prior intervention . A second randomly select group CNAs nurse take survey intervention . Research assistants enrol resident NHAP , interview nurse quality life , assess function review medical record . The intervention multifaceted , include ( 1 ) formative phase tailor implementation foster staff investment process outcome , ( 2 ) institutional level change facilitate immunization use appropriate antibiotic test ; ( 3 ) interactive educational session improve nursing assessment ; ( 4 ) academic detail physician impact diagnostic prescribing practice . Data analyze Template Analysis Technique qualitative data ; test-retest reliability knowledge attitude survey ; exploratory bivariate comparison intervention delivery uptake , process care outcomes intervention control facility . Status : Project work ongoing .
